name: xinlianxin-text-correction
description: 广西心连心公司员工内部文本纠错小程序 - 集成文本纠错、文本对比、智能分析等多功能模块

scripts.smoke: node -e "(async()=>{const base='http://localhost:'+ (process.env.PORT||3003);const j=a=>JSON.stringify(a);function log(t){console.log(t)}try{let r=await fetch(base+'/api/health');if(!r.ok)throw new Error('health http '+r.status);let h=await r.json();log('[health] ok '+j(h));r=await fetch(base+'/api/status');if(!r.ok)throw new Error('status http '+r.status);let s=await r.json();log('[status] ok '+j(s));r=await fetch(base+'/api/correct-text',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({text:'这是一段待纠错的中文文本，用于冒烟测试。'})});if(!r.ok)throw new Error('correct-text http '+r.status);let c=await r.json();if(!c.success)throw new Error('correct-text success=false');log('[correct-text] ok');process.exit(0);}catch(e){console.error('[smoke] FAIL',e.message||e);process.exit(1);}})()"

author: 广西心连心公司
